Name: Human-Like
About the game: The Helios Council has just discovered that Tenjin Research Corp. has been conducting illicit AI research in deep space. Now, as a Helios agent, itâ€™s time for covert damage control. Your mission: infiltrate the research station, assess the threat level, and destroy their work. Good luck, agent. Powered by machine learning and advanced artificial intelligence algorithms, that learns your moves as you run throughout the research station. Each item you use, every path you take, and every juke you attempt will help it adapt and anticipate your next move. Think creatively, innovate new strategies, and keep changing your own tactics if you want to survive the machine's blade. Evade your enemy with 2D, side-scrolling platforming. Run, jump, slide, and teleport through the inner workings of the research station.
